article_title: Adobe Turns to DevOps Platform to Manage Cloud Delivery
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: To improve its software delivery process, Adobe is embracing a cloud-based platform designed to speed up traditional work flows while supporting a broader range of development technologies.
twitter.title: Adobe Turns to DevOps Platform to Manage Cloud Delivery
